topic.title: Installing the License Server Distribution for Windows

ol.li: Download the HTTP license server installer from the HTTP License Server website.
Run the installer and follow the on-screen instructions.

You must configure two sets of credentials:
Administrator credentials - Used for accessing the Oxygen license server administrative interface.
Standard user credentials - Used by an Oxygen application to connect to the license server.

You can choose to change the default 8080 port the server runs on. If you need to change the port after the installation, you can edit the following vmoptions file: oXygen HTTP License Server\Windows Service\oXygenHTTPLicenseServer.vmoptions.
Optionally, you can choose to install the server as a Windows service. In this case, you can choose the name of the Windows service.

p.note: In case you run into issues, the license server log file is located in: [Installation_Directory]\work\logs\oXygenLicenseServlet.log.
